happy.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
happy.author: George Sand

happy.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
happy.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happy.quote: Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be.
happy.author: Abraham Lincoln

happy.quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
happy.author: Marthe Troly-Curtin, Phrynette Married

happy.quote: It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace.
happy.author: Chuck Palahniuk, Diary

happy.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
happy.author: Mahatma Gandhi

happy.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
happy.author: Dalai Lama XIV

happy.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
happy.author: John Lennon

happy.quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
happy.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

sad.quote: So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be.
sad.author: Stephen Chbosky

sad.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
sad.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

sad.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
sad.author: Nicholas Sparks

sad.quote: I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more.
sad.author: C.S. Lewis

sad.quote: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
sad.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

sad.quote: You're like a song that I heard when I was a little kid but forgot I knew until I heard it again.
sad.author: Maggie Stiefvater

sad.quote: The funniest people are the saddest ones
sad.author: Confucius

sad.quote: Melancholy is the happiness of being sad.
sad.author: Victor Hugo

sad.quote: I'm guilty of giving people more chances than they deserve but when I'm done, I'm done.
sad.author: Turcois Ominek

sad.quote: There's nothing good about goodnight when it means goodbye
sad.author: Jeff Thomas

afraid.quote: Always do what you're afraid to do.
afraid.author: E. Lockhart

afraid.quote: Don't be afraid of being scared. To be afraid is a sign of common sense. Only complete idiots are not afraid of anything.
afraid.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

afraid.quote: I was afraid of being rejected, yes. I was also afraid of being accepted for the wrong reasons.
afraid.author: Erich Segal

afraid.quote: I'm going to die whatever you do, but I'm not afraid.
afraid.author: Erin Hunter

afraid.quote: I’m afraid I’ll be a book that no one reads. Music that no one listens to anymore. I’m afraid I’ll be abandoned like a movie playing in an empty theater.
afraid.author: Tablo

afraid.quote: He will never have true friends who is afraid of making enemies.
afraid.author: William Hazlitt

afraid.quote: Beethoven said that it's better to hit the wrong note confidently, than hit the right note unconfidently. Never be afraid to be wrong or to embarrass yourself; we are all students in this life, and there is always something more to learn.
afraid.author: Mike Norton

afraid.quote: Never be afraid to be sexy!
afraid.author: Alysha Speer

afraid.quote: it's doors I'm afraid of because I can't see through them, its the door opening by itself in the wind I'm afraid of.
afraid.author: Margaret Atwood

afraid.quote: He steals your knees, not because he needs you, but because he feeds off of your fears.
afraid.author: Dominic Riccitello

angry.quote: There are two things a person should never be angry at, what they can help, and what they cannot.
angry.author: Plato

angry.quote: Speak when you are angry, and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
angry.author: Laurence J. Peter

angry.quote: Life is so short. The only person you hurt when you stay angry or hold grudges is you. Forgive everyone, including yourself.
angry.author: Tom Giaquinto

angry.quote: If you're angry at stupid people, you're tempted to join them.
angry.author: Toba Beta

angry.quote: The world needs more anger. The world often continues to allow evil because it isn't angry enough.
angry.author: Bede Jarrett

angry.quote: It is when you are angry that you must watch how you talk.
angry.author: Chaim Potok

angry.quote: Be angry. But don't be bitter.
angry.author: David Paul Kirkpatrick

angry.quote: Strong anger can only make you weaker than you already are
angry.author: Munia Khan

angry.quote: I'm not really angry at you. I'm just angry at myself for not doing anything.
angry.author: Anthony T. Hincks

angry.quote: The warrior must never get angry in war.
angry.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

confused.quote: I just want to be someone, to mean something to anyone…
confused.author: Charlotte Eriksson

confused.quote: Sometimes hate is just confused love!
confused.author: Omar Tyree

confused.quote: I freely admit I'm confused. I'm a confused and troubled individual but at the same time...Its Free!
confused.author: Craig Ferguson

confused.quote: I've never been lost, but I was mighty turned around for three days once.
confused.author: Daniel Boone

confused.quote: I'm too open minded that I don't know what to mind anymore.
confused.author: Ahmed Mostafa

confused.quote: I danced as he twirled in and out of consciousness, and there we were, one in love and the other astray.
confused.author: Dominic Riccitello

confused.quote: Love is when two people who care for each other get confused.
confused.author: Rahul Rawat

confused.quote: If your mind is not clear then settle down
confused.author: Herbern Lebumfacil

confused.quote: God can pick sense out of a confused prayer.
confused.author: Richard Sibbes

guilty.quote: I'm guilty of giving people more chances than they deserve but when I'm done, I'm done.
guilty.author: Turcois Ominek

guilty.quote: When hatred judges, the verdict is just guilty.
guilty.author: Toba Beta

guilty.quote: Guilt is a feeling that you owe a debt that you're not paying.
guilty.author: Stefan Molyneux

guilty.quote: Don’t feel guilty for a crime you have not committed – commit it and be guilt free
guilty.author: Amit Abraham

guilty.quote: Innocence falls on the deaf ears of the guilty.
guilty.author: Anthony T.Hincks

guilty.quote: Aging is not our fault, but we certainly are guilty of feeling it.
guilty.author: Munia Khan

guilty.quote: Every one of us is guilty of something!
guilty.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

guilty.quote: Well, if my crime is love, then I am indeed guilty
guilty.author: Elise Kova

guilty.quote: Guilt cannot change you; it can only hint that there’s something worth your effort to change.
guilty.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

guilty.quote: When you give decision that the guilty is not guilty, only then will the guilty become not guilty.
guilty.author: Dada Bhagwan

lonely.quote: All alone! Whether you like it or not, alone is something you'll be quite a lot!
lonely.author: Dr. Seuss

lonely.quote: The loneliness you feel with another person, the wrong person, is the loneliest of all.
lonely.author: Deb Caletti

lonely.quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder, but it sure makes the rest of you lonely.
lonely.author: Charles M. Schulz

lonely.quote: The trouble is not really in being alone, it's being lonely. One can be lonely in the midst of a crowd, don't you think?
lonely.author: Christine Feehan

lonely.quote: It's so stupid because all I wanted was space and now that I have it, there's this part of me that's achingly lonely I could die.
lonely.author: Hannah Harrington

lonely.quote: There were people everywhere on the city street, but the stranger could not have been more alone if it were empty.
lonely.author: Markus Zusak

lonely.quote: It is beautiful, it is endless, it is full and yet seems empty. It hurts us.
lonely.author: Jackson Pearce

lonely.quote: My heart is a thousand years old. I am not like other people.
lonely.author: Charles Bukowski

lonely.quote: Having someone wonder where you are when you don't come home at night is a very old human need.
lonely.author: Margaret Mead

lonely.quote: To me, you were more than just a person. You were a place where I finally felt at home.
lonely.author: Denice Envall
